description: Lychee- infused margaritas are a great way to sip on something different. They offer the perfect balance of sweet and tart, which is why they're so popular among those who enjoy margarita night or just need some new flavors in their&nbsp;cocktails!
name: Tanteo Lychees Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle lychees in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Muddle lychees in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well and strain into a glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well and strain into a glass.
